uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools
Class GeoLabel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Label
              |
              +--uk.ac.leeds.ccg.geotools.GeoLabel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.util.EventListener, HighlightChangedListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class GeoLabel
extends java.awt.Label
implements HighlightChangedListener

A simple label that can display items from a GeoData object. The class implements Highlight changed listener so that it can be attached to a highlight manager, in this way it will automaticaly display information relating to the currently highlighted item.

See Also:
Serialized Form
